title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Ancient skeletons’ genes reveal origin of the Slavic people
items.description: DNA connects modern Slavs to a wave of migration following the fall of the Roman Empire

items.title: Data from defunct NASA lander paint a radical new picture of Mars’s interior
items.description: Studies identify a solid inner core and buried remnants of giant impacts

items.title: Ant queen lays eggs that hatch into two species
items.description: Bizarre discovery of interspecies cloning “almost impossible to believe,” biologists say

items.title: Vote by Dutch lawmakers threatens major primate research center
items.description: In victory for animal rights activists, research on monkeys would end in 2030

items.title: House Republicans add to support for maintaining NIH budget in 2026
items.description: Both chambers of Congress have now rejected Trump’s proposed 40% cut

items.title: NSF could be moving down the street
items.description: Government sets requirements for new space that sound like nearby patent office campus

items.title: Human ancestors braved England’s ice-covered northlands 440,000 years ago
items.description: How exactly ancient toolmakers survived the harsh conditions remains a mystery

items.title: Legal adviser warns NIH not to kill 900 grants a second time
items.description: Advice follows Supreme Court ruling that threatened previously restored grants, but reprieve may be brief

items.title: Stalagmites reveal devastating droughts that helped spur Maya breakdown
items.description: Series of droughts chronicled in cave rocks likely pushed civilization to breaking point

items.title: Trust in elections rises after ‘inoculations’ meant to preempt false fraud claims
items.description: New U.S.-Brazil study points to ways of countering election misinformation, political scientists say
